channel.title: Ghost Trackers
channel.description: You are listening to a Ghost Trackers' Podcast. The "ghost" will bring you information and stories from the Ghost Trackers, tips and techniques and events regarding ghost hunting. The Ghost Trackers Paranormal Research Group are dedicated to the Research, Investigation and Documentation of Paranormal Activity.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Listen to the "ghost" for stories, tips & techniques and more!!
channel.itunes:author: Ghost
channel.itunes:summary: You are listening to a Ghost Trackers' Podcast. The "ghost" will bring you information and stories from the Ghost Trackers, tips and techniques and events regarding ghost hunting. The Ghost Trackers Paranormal Research Group are dedicated to the Research, Investigation and Documentation of Paranormal Activity.

item.title: EVP - Part Deux
item.description: This is a Ghost Trackers Podcast. The ghost brings you another story from the files of the Ghost Trackers. This is the second in the series of Podcasts about EVP or electronic voice phenomenon. In the story, she explains EVP and how to obtain it.
item.dc:creator: Ghost
item.itunes:summary: This is a Ghost Trackers Podcast. The ghost brings you another story from the files of the Ghost Trackers. This is the second in the series of Podcasts about EVP or electronic voice phenomenon. In the story, she explains EVP and how to obtain it.

item.title: Ghost Talk - EVP Helps You Hear Them Talk
item.description: This is a Ghost Trackers Podcast. The ghost brings you another story from the file of the Ghost Trackers. EVP is something everyone wants to know about. This is the first in a series of Podcasts on EVP and exactly what it is.
item.dc:creator: Ghost
item.itunes:summary: This is a Ghost Trackers Podcast. The ghost brings you another story from the file of the Ghost Trackers. EVP is something everyone wants to know about. This is the first in a series of Podcasts on EVP and exactly what it is.

item.title: Ghost Hunting 101 - You Can Hunt Ghosts Too!!
item.description: This is a Ghost Trackers Podcast. The "ghost" brings another story from the files of the Ghost Trackers. This time the "ghost" gives you simple instructions on ghost hunting. She teaches you what to do, how to do it and when. These primary instructions are the tools you can use when ghost hunting.
item.dc:creator: Ghost
item.itunes:summary: This is a Ghost Trackers Podcast. The "ghost" brings another story from the files of the Ghost Trackers. This time the "ghost" gives you simple instructions on ghost hunting. She teaches you what to do, how to do it and when. These primary instructions are the tools you can use when ghost hunting.

item.title: Psychics, Sensitives and Mediums: Do They Really See Ghosts?
item.description: This is a Ghost Trackers Podcast. The "ghost" brings you another story from the files of the Ghost Trackers. This story deals with psychics and mediums and an experience during a seance that opened her mind to the possibilities that psychics and mediums deal with when holding seances or working with ghosts.
item.dc:creator: Ghost
item.itunes:summary: This is a Ghost Trackers Podcast. The "ghost" brings you another story from the files of the Ghost Trackers. This story deals with psychics and mediums and an experience during a seance that opened her mind to the possibilities that psychics and mediums deal with when holding seances or working with ghosts.

item.title: Ghosts In Our House - One True Story
item.description: This is a Ghost Trackers Podcast. The "ghost" brings you this new story of a ghost in her house and how she had to contend with it. Ghosts and hauntings occur regularly and many times people are unaware of what to do or how. The "ghost" brings her story of this pesky poltergeist and how she learned to share space. Listen for future Podcasts from the "ghost" and the Ghost Trackers.
